verses.verse: O give thanks <WH3034> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>, for he is good <WH2896>: for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>.
Let the redeemed <WH1350> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068> say <WH559> <WH8799> so, whom he hath redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804> from the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH6862>;
And gathered <WH6908> <WH8765> them out of the lands <WH776>, from the east <WH4217>, and from the west <WH4628>, from the north <WH6828>, and from the south <WH3220>.
They wandered <WH8582> <WH8804> in the wilderness <WH4057> in a solitary <WH3452> way <WH1870>; they found <WH4672> <WH8804> no city <WH5892> to dwell <WH4186> in.
Hungry <WH7457> and thirsty <WH6771>, their soul <WH5315> fainted <WH5848> <WH8691> in them.
Then they cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, and he delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> them out of their distresses <WH4691>.
And he led them forth <WH1869> <WH8686> by the right <WH3477> way <WH1870>, that they might go <WH3212> <WH8800> to a city <WH5892> of habitation <WH4186>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> for his goodness <WH2617>, and for his wonderful works <WH6381> <WH8737> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> !
For he satisfieth <WH7646> <WH8689> the longing <WH8264> <WH8802> soul <WH5315>, and filleth <WH4390> <WH8765> the hungry <WH7457> soul <WH5315> with goodness <WH2896>.
Such as sit <WH3427> <WH8802> in darkness <WH2822> and in the shadow of death <WH6757>, being bound <WH615> in affliction <WH6040> and iron <WH1270>;
Because they rebelled <WH4784> <WH8689> against the words <WH561> of 'Elohim <WH410>, and contemned <WH5006> <WH8804> the counsel <WH6098> of Ha `Elyon <WH5945>:
Therefore he brought down <WH3665> <WH8686> their heart <WH3820> with labour <WH5999>; they fell down <WH3782> <WH8804>, and there was none to help <WH5826> <WH8802>.
Then they cried <WH2199> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, and he saved <WH3467> <WH8686> them out of their distresses <WH4691>.
He brought them out <WH3318> <WH8686> of darkness <WH2822> and the shadow of death <WH6757>, and brake <WH5423> their bands <WH4147> in sunder <WH5423> <WH8762>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> for his goodness <WH2617>, and for his wonderful works <WH6381> <WH8737> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> !
For he hath broken <WH7665> <WH8765> the gates <WH1817> of brass <WH5178>, and cut <WH1438> the bars <WH1280> of iron <WH1270> in sunder <WH1438> <WH8765>.
Fools <WH191> because <WH1870> of their transgression <WH6588>, and because of their iniquities <WH5771>, are afflicted <WH6031> <WH8691>.
Their soul <WH5315> abhorreth <WH8581> <WH8762> all manner of meat <WH400>; and they draw near <WH5060> <WH8686> unto the gates <WH8179> of death <WH4194>.
Then they cry <WH2199> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, and he saveth <WH3467> <WH8686> them out of their distresses <WH4691>.
He sent <WH7971> <WH8799> his word <WH1697>, and healed <WH7495> <WH8799> them, and delivered <WH4422> <WH8762> them from their destructions <WH7825>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> for his goodness <WH2617>, and for his wonderful works <WH6381> <WH8737> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> !
And let them sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> the sacrifices <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426>, and declare <WH5608> <WH8762> his works <WH4639> with rejoicing <WH7440>.
They that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the sea <WH3220> in ships <WH591>, that do <WH6213> <WH8802> business <WH4399> in great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>;
These see <WH7200> <WH8804> the works <WH4639> of the YY <WH3068>, and his wonders <WH6381> <WH8737> in the deep <WH4688>.
For he commandeth <WH559> <WH8799>, and raiseht <WH5975> <WH8686> the stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307>, which lifteth up <WH7311> <WH8787> the waves <WH1530> thereof.
They mount up <WH5927> <WH8799> to the heaven <WH8064>, they go down <WH3381> <WH8799> again to the depths <WH8415>: their soul <WH5315> is melted <WH4127> <WH8709> because of trouble <WH7451>.
They reel to and fro <WH2287> <WH8799>, and stagger <WH5128> <WH8799> like a drunken man <WH7910>, and are at their wits <WH2451> ' end <WH1104> <WH8691>.
Then they cry <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> in their trouble <WH6862>, and he bringeth them out <WH3318> <WH8686> of their distresses <WH4691>.
He maketh <WH6965> <WH8686> the storm <WH5591> a calm <WH1827>, so that the waves <WH1530> thereof are still <WH2814> <WH8799>.
Then are they glad <WH8055> <WH8799> because they be quiet <WH8367> <WH8799>; so he bringeth <WH5148> <WH8686> them unto their desired <WH2656> haven <WH4231>.
Oh that men would praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> for his goodness <WH2617>, and for his wonderful works <WH6381> <WH8737> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120> !
Let them exalt <WH7311> <WH8787> him also in the congregation <WH6951> of the people <WH5971>, and praise <WH1984> <WH8762> him in the assembly <WH4186> of the elders <WH2205>.
He turneth <WH7760> <WH8799> rivers <WH5104> into a wilderness <WH4057>, and the watersprings <WH4325> <WH4161> into dry ground <WH6774>;
A fruitful <WH6529> land <WH776> into barrenness <WH4420>, for the wickedness <WH7451> of them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein.
He turneth <WH7760> <WH8799> the wilderness <WH4057> into a standing <WH98> water <WH4325>, and dry <WH6723> ground <WH776> into watersprings <WH4325> <WH4161>.
And there he maketh the hungry <WH7457> to dwell <WH3427> <WH8686>, that they may prepare <WH3559> <WH8787> a city <WH5892> for habitation <WH4186>;
And sow <WH2232> <WH8799> the fields <WH7704>, and plant <WH5193> <WH8799> vineyards <WH3754>, which may yield <WH6213> <WH8799> fruits <WH6529> of increase <WH8393>.
He blesseht <WH1288> <WH8762> them also, so that they are multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799> greatly <WH3966>; and suffereth <WH4591> not their cattle <WH929> to decrease <WH4591> <WH8686>.
Again, they are minished <WH4591> <WH8799> and brought low <WH7817> <WH8799> through oppression <WH6115>, affliction <WH7451>, and sorrow <WH3015>.
He poureth <WH8210> <WH8802> contempt <WH937> upon princes <WH5081>, and causeht them to wander <WH8582> <WH8686> in the wilderness <WH8414>, where there is no way <WH1870>.
Yet setteth he the poor <WH34> on high <WH7682> <WH8762> from affliction <WH6040>, and maketh <WH7760> <WH8799> him families <WH4940> like a flock <WH6629>.
The righteous <WH3477> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>: and all iniquity <WH5766> shall stop <WH7092> <WH8804> her mouth <WH6310>.
Whoso is wise <WH2450>, and will observe <WH8104> <WH8799> these things, even they shall understand <WH995> <WH8709> the lovingkindness <WH2617> of the YY <WH3068>.
